desc.en: Neru struggles as she tries to figure out how to put on her bunny girl outfit and eventually asks Sensei for help.
desc.jp: Neru struggles as she tries to figure out how to put on her bunny girl outfit and eventually asks Sensei for help.
desc.zh_cn: 因为不知道如何穿兔女郎装，{cf宁瑠}不得已只能向老师求助。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Neru scrapes her foot trying to get used to wearing an unfamiliar outfit while practicing infiltration drills. Sensei rushes to the gym upon hearing that Neru has hurt herself.
desc.jp: Neru scrapes her foot trying to get used to wearing an unfamiliar outfit while practicing infiltration drills. Sensei rushes to the gym upon hearing that Neru has hurt herself.
desc.zh_cn: 为了不久后的潜入作战，{cf宁瑠}特地换上兔女郎装以提前适应。然而由于没穿过这样的服装，{cf宁瑠}不小心摔了一大跤。得知{cf宁瑠}脚磨破皮的事后，老师匆忙赶到体育馆找{cf宁瑠}。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Neru shows up to school wearing the bunny girl outfit, completely oblivious and unconcerned about her attire. Feeling the stares of the other students, Neru senses something is amiss and calls for Sensei.
desc.jp: Neru shows up to school wearing the bunny girl outfit, completely oblivious and unconcerned about her attire. Feeling the stares of the other students, Neru senses something is amiss and calls for Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 由于对什么时候该穿什么样衣服没有概念，{cf宁瑠}正大光明地穿着兔女郎装走进了学校。感受到旁人的异样眼光后，总算察觉不对劲的{cf宁瑠}叫住了老师。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

profile.en:
The president of C&C who changed into a bunny girl outfit for a special mission. 

It's not the kind of outfit Neru would normally wear, but she doesn't hesitate to wear it for a mission.
She is laying low and dialing down her usual temperament for the mission's sake, but she still won't give up her flashy bomber jacket.
profile.jp:
ミレニアムサイエンススクール所属、任務のためにバニーガール衣装へと着替えた秘密組織「C&C」のリーダー。

普段なら彼女は絶対に着ないような衣装だが、任務のためなら仕方がない。普段から作戦のためとなれば色々と我慢している彼女ではあるが、それでもそのスカジャンだけは脱がない模様。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
千年科学学园所属，为了执行任务而换上了兔女郎服的秘密组织「C&C」的领袖。

平时她绝不会穿上这种服装，但如果是为了任务的话就只能勉为其难了。
平时为了作战她能忍受各种事情，但只有那件横须贺夹克决不妥协。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
千年科学学园所属，为了任务而换上兔女郎装的「C&C」队长。

平常的话，她是绝对不会穿上这身服装，但为了任务也没办法。平常为了作战，她能忍耐各种事，但只有那件丝卡将是绝对不肯脱下。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
为了执行特殊任务而换上邦妮装的C&C部长。

为了执行任务，她义不容辞地穿上了平时绝对不会穿的衣服。
为了完成任务，她收敛了平时的臭脾气，事事忍耐，但唯独不能脱下那件刺绣夹克。

gacha.en: Seriously, this is not my cup of tea.
gacha.zh_cn_cn: 说真的，我有点不喜欢这个……

intro.en: Why pick this of all outfits? Well, it's surprisingly easy to move around in. Hahaha!
intro.jp:
ったく、なんでこんな変な服を…
ま、意外と動きやすいから良いけどな、ははっ！
intro.zh_cn_jp:
ったく、なんでこんな変な服を…
ま、意外と動きやすいから良いけどな、ははっ！
intro.zh_cn_tw:
真是，为什么要穿这种奇怪的衣服…
嘛，意外的方面行动也可以呢，哈哈！

desc.en: C&C and Sensei infiltrate the systems office to take control of the surveillance system, but old habits die hard, and they end up blowing it sky high.
desc.jp: C&C and Sensei infiltrate the systems office to take control of the surveillance system, but old habits die hard, and they end up blowing it sky high.
desc.zh_cn: 为掌控邮轮上的监视系统，老师和{cnC&C}本来打算占领中控室，然而本性难改的他们最后仍旧失手将中控室炸毁。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.jp:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.zh_cn:
为了捕捉{sn千年}的问题儿童「白兔」，{cnC&C}收到了出动的请求。
但她逃跑的目的地，竟然是{sn其他}学园的豪华邮轮！在有着奇怪规则的船上，{cnC&C}的全体成员必须换上兔女郎装……？

desc.en:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.jp:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.zh_cn:
为了捕捉{sn千年}的问题儿童「白兔」，{cnC&C}收到了出动的请求。
但她逃跑的目的地，竟然是{sn其他}学园的豪华邮轮！在有着奇怪规则的船上，{cnC&C}的全体成员必须换上兔女郎装……？

desc.en: C&C find themselves in a pickle after blowing up the systems office. Akane is beating herself up when Sensei proposes a Plan B.
desc.jp: C&C find themselves in a pickle after blowing up the systems office. Akane is beating herself up when Sensei proposes a Plan B.
desc.zh_cn: 由于失手炸毁中控室，{cnC&C}面临前所未见的危机，而{cf朱音}在自责的同时也向老师提议了一项B计划。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.

desc.en: C&C wake up the kidnapped bunny girl and start interrogating her. Karin takes the lead, but the guard faints after being tickled for too long.
desc.jp: C&C wake up the kidnapped bunny girl and start interrogating her. Karin takes the lead, but the guard faints after being tickled for too long.
desc.zh_cn: {cnC&C}叫醒了先前胁持的兔女郎保镳，并尝试从她嘴里获取情报。{cf花凛}的拷问起初进行得相当顺利，直到最后那名兔女郎保镳因为承受不了持续的搔痒攻击而昏死过去。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.jp:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.zh_cn:
为了捕捉{sn千年}的问题儿童「白兔」，{cnC&C}收到了出动的请求。
但她逃跑的目的地，竟然是{sn其他}学园的豪华邮轮！在有着奇怪规则的船上，{cnC&C}的全体成员必须换上兔女郎装……？

desc.en:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.jp:
C&C is on the case to arrest White Rabbit, the troublemaker of Millennium.
However, White Rabbit flees onto the luxury cruise ship of another academy! The members of C&C have no choice but to hide their identities by disguising themselves as bunny girls to infiltrate the ship.
desc.zh_cn:
为了捕捉{sn千年}的问题儿童「白兔」，{cnC&C}收到了出动的请求。
但她逃跑的目的地，竟然是{sn其他}学园的豪华邮轮！在有着奇怪规则的船上，{cnC&C}的全体成员必须换上兔女郎装……？

desc.en: C&C busts onto the scene as usual when their best-laid plans fail. They spot White Rabbit and succeed in getting close to her but blow their cover at the last moment.
desc.jp: C&C busts onto the scene as usual when their best-laid plans fail. They spot White Rabbit and succeed in getting close to her but blow their cover at the last moment.
desc.zh_cn: 眼见她们事前拟定的计划一一失败，{cnC&C}只好采取老方法「正面对决」。就在老师和{cnC&C}成功找到白兔，而且快要接近她的时候，白兔还是发现了他们的存在。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

name.en: Problem Solving, the C&C Way Part 1
name.jp: Problem Solving, the C&C Way Part 1

desc.en: Neru and Sensei are thrown into the ship's holding cell, and White Rabbit mocks them. Akane and Karin soon follow but also as prisoners.
desc.jp: Neru and Sensei are thrown into the ship's holding cell, and White Rabbit mocks them. Akane and Karin soon follow but also as prisoners.
desc.zh_cn: 见到{cf宁瑠}和老师被关进邮轮内的拘留所，白兔幸灾乐祸地嘲讽着两人。虽然{cf朱音}和{cf花凛}很快便来到拘留所，但大家后来才得知她们两人其实也同样是保镳被抓来的。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

name.en: Problem Solving, the C&C Way Part 2
name.jp: Problem Solving, the C&C Way Part 2

desc.en: White Rabbit is smug and triumphant as Neru's spirits are down. However, the tables turn when Asuna becomes a VIP, and C&C resumes its pursuit of White Rabbit.
desc.jp: White Rabbit is smug and triumphant as Neru's spirits are down. However, the tables turn when Asuna becomes a VIP, and C&C resumes its pursuit of White Rabbit.
desc.zh_cn: 就在{cf宁瑠}越来越沮丧，而白兔也越来越得意的时候，情势却突然有了一百八十度的大转变。由于{cf明日奈}摇身成为邮轮VIP，{cnC&C}的猎兔行动也再次展开。

desc.en: White Rabbit howls as Neru cheerfully hunts her down. Sensei and the other members stand by silently as they watch the scene.
desc.jp: White Rabbit howls as Neru cheerfully hunts her down. Sensei and the other members stand by silently as they watch the scene.
desc.zh_cn: 在老师和其他{cnC&C}成员的默许之下，{cf宁瑠}像只喜欢戏弄猎物的猎犬一样，兴奋地追着不停哭喊求饶的白兔。

desc.en: White Rabbit attempts to escape the ship on a drone but is sniped down by Karin and finally arrested. C&C has completed another mission, albeit roughly and messily.
desc.jp: White Rabbit attempts to escape the ship on a drone but is sniped down by Karin and finally arrested. C&C has completed another mission, albeit roughly and messily.
desc.zh_cn: 白兔原本打算搭乘停放在邮轮顶层的无人机逃离，但是由于无人机被{cf花凛}击落，因此最终她还是被{cnC&C}逮回了{sn千年}学园。就这样，{cnC&C}又再次顺利地完成了一项任务，并且为{cn研讨会}留下了一大堆烂摊子。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
